value.text: Having a party? A baby shower? A meeting? No problem :)

Book table

We would love to reserve a table for you. Fill in the form below and we will get back to you with a confirmation as soon as possible.

Book a table

Book meeting/activity

Need a room for meeting with the housing association, working meeting, mothers/fathers group or a private party, try our activity room which accommodates about 10 people. The activity room has four large tables, a nice big whiteboard to draw on and if you need to show presentations or other media you can use our TV with many connectivity options. The four tables can be stacked in the case you need floor space.

Room rent and catering:

Rent our activity room with facilities as well as black coffee, tea and ice water ad libitum. Price is 600 kr. for 4 hours with up to 10 participants. It is possible to add more hours and participants for a fee.

Extra packages:

Breakfast package: add our delicious breakfast dish for only 50 kr. per person

  1. Lunch package: add our delicious homemade sandwiches for only 50 kr. per person

  2. Snack package 1: add freshly baked bread with butter and fruit platter for only 35 kr. per person

  3. Snack package 2: add freshly baked cake for only 25 kr. per person

  4. Soft drinks while renting the room, only 20 kr. per bottle

  5. Other drinks - we can offer all our delicious hot and cold drinks - call for price

If you have questions or special requests, please contact Julia Eliasen on julia@sweetsurrender.dk.

value.heading: Book party
value.subheading: Delicious package deals with lunch or brunch buffet
value.brunchText:
Brunch Buffet

Brunch buffet includes:

  • Scrambled eggs

  • Bacon

  • Brunch Sausages

  • Homemade tuna mousse

  • Fried potato wedges and mushrooms

  • Cheese, butter, jam

  • Fruit platter, yoghurt with homemade muesli

  • Homemade pancakes (American with syrup)

  • 2 kinds of pie, green salad, humus

  • Rye bread, and freshly baked bread

  • Juice, coffee, tea

Standard Package includes room rent for 3 hours, team for serving, preparing the food and facilities as well as tidying up and cleaning.

It is possible to buy additional hours, cake, welcome drink and other additional services. Download the price list.
value.lunchText:
Lunch Buffet

Lunch buffet includes:

  • Warm liver paste with bacon and mushrooms

  • Homemade pizza snails (with and without meat)

  • Chicken thighs

  • Homemade tuna mousse

  • Homemade egg salad

  • Homemade potato Salad

  • Homemade pasta Salad

  • Homemade humus

  • Green salad

  • 2 kinds of pie

  • Rye bread, freshly baked bread

  • Juice, coffee, tea

Standard Package includes room rent for 3 hours, team for serving, preparing the food and facilities as well as tidying up and cleaning.

It is possible to buy additional hours, cake, welcome drink and other additional services. Download the price list.
value.body:
Hold your next christening, birthday or other celebration at Sweet Surrender. We offer two delicious packages with brunch or lunch buffet which you can enjoy together with your guests in our cozy and child-friendly facilities. We will take care of it all for you, so just enjoy the day along with the guests.

Read more below and contact Julia Eliasen on julia@sweetsurrender.dk to hear more. You can also book online here.

value.text: Thanks. We had an absolutely fantastic day! The food was very delicious and we enjoyed it all together. The place is cozy and perfect fit for a naming celebration. The staff was wildly sweet and quite trendy. We could just sit back and enjoy the day together with our guests.
value.name: Lone Jakobsen

value.text: We had an absolutely fantastic day! Much of the success was undoubtedly to be with you! Lovely food, cozy atmosphere, space, and not least yours truly pleasant and sweet staff. One sensed to be taken care off!! Our guests were also very impressed with the place and the food. So THANK YOU!
value.name: Katrine Muff Enevoldsen

value.text: Thank you for wonderful food and lovely setting for our son's baptism. We had a really good day and we are fully satisfied with the food, place and servicing. From the guests came also many praises for the food. So THOUSAND thanks from us!!
value.name: Anne Ulrik

value.text: We had a really nice day, great place to host an event especially with children. Delicious food and cute girls who took care of it all. Only praise from here and itâ€™s certainly not the last time we choose to host something at the cafe.
value.name: Heidi Hvam
